1439940.name: Adams Ascending Demo
1439940.description: Explore the mysterious world of Adam's Ascending: a powerful, and dimensional paradise that holds the past, present, and future of your soul. Choose your gameplay style by the paths you take. Will you make the decision to take on the world with physical strength or supernatural powers? The choice is yours. New found awakening awaits every step, and there's only your instinct to guide you.
